Remember, saying that you don't trust yourself implies that you think you'd misuse it. Another way to phrase the question would be "Do you think you'd misuse a firearm?"
 
 Remember, votes are public, so don't vote if you're not willing to share your decision.
 
 Finally, don't dismiss it as being irrelevant wether or not you trust yourself. That's changing the subject. If you're going to talk about that, start a new thread. This is not the place for that kind of discussion.
